A FREE SMOOTHIE* IS AN APP AWAY

DOWNLOAD, JOIN TROPIC REWARDS® & GET ONE AFTER YOUR 1ST PURCHASE*

Terms and conditions apply

NEW YEAR, NEW DELICIOUS WAYS TO SIP YOUR PROTEIN

Ring in the New Year with three new mouth-watering blends. Sip our Cherry Berry Protein Smoothie with 24g of protein, our Chocolate PB Protein Smoothie with 30g & our Almond Banana Protein Smoothie with 29g.
ORDER NOW 
THE ONLY CRUSH YOU ACTUALLY WANT IS BACK

The Chocolate Covered Strawberry Smoothie is back and serving delicious chocolatey flavor. Here for a limited time, love it before it leaves!
ORDER NOW 
TROPIC REWARDS IS WHERE IT’S AT
® 
We’re letting you in on a little secret! The fastest way to score free tropic faves is signing up for Tropic Rewards! It’s as easy as downloading our app and earning points with every qualifying order. Get started today! ​
LEARN MORE 
Find your next tropic getaway

SIPS & BITES THAT TASTE AS FRESH AS THE TROPICS

We thought it was about time somebody gave good-for-you a glow-up! With our deliciously tropical twist on fresh-from-the-blender smoothies and freshly made wraps and flatbreads, eating fruits and veggies has never been this much fun.
ORDER NOW 
Bite into vacay vibes with a Tropic Bowl!

Go hazelNUTS for the Acai Bowl with NUTELLA®, PB Protein Crunch Bowl packed with 32 grams of protein or dive spoon first into any of our Breakfast Bowls topped with refreshing fruit, granola & chia seeds.
ORDER NOW 
MADE-TO-ORDER-SMOOTHIES

Here in the tropics, we’re serving up fresh from the blender smoothies all day long – just the way you like it. Customize yours with add-ins like protein or collagen and even choose your preferred sweetness level!
ORDER NOW View Menu 
About Tropical Smoothie Cafe

Tropical Smoothie Cafe® was born on a beach® and on that beach, we learned a better way to live. We make eating better easy breezy with fresh, made to order smoothies, wraps, flatbreads and bowls that instantly boost your mood. 

Experience the good vibes of the tropics whether you’re ordering ahead in our app or online for delivery, curbside* or pickup. It’s like a tiny vacay in the middle of your day. You're on Tropic Time Now®. 

*At participating locations.
Visit our site
